committees.name: Raffle & Auction
committees.description: Organize and manage the silent auction and raffle — from sourcing items and setting up displays to coordinating bidding and winner notifications.
committees.needs: Item procurement, pricing, display setup, checkout coordination

committees.name: Event Coordination
committees.description: Plan and execute the festival logistics — venue setup, scheduling, day-of operations, and making sure everything runs smoothly from start to finish.
committees.needs: Planning, scheduling, vendor coordination, on-site management

committees.name: Web & Social Media
committees.description: Manage our online presence — website updates, social media content, photography, and spreading the word about the festival and our mission.
committees.needs: Content creation, photography, graphic design, community engagement

committees.name: Fundraising & Sponsorship
committees.description: Build relationships with local businesses and donors to secure sponsorships, in-kind donations, and funding that makes the festival possible.
committees.needs: Outreach, relationship building, grant writing, donor communications
